item.title: Static Multidimensional Arrays and Pointers in C
item.description: Multi-dimensional arrays in C can be somewhat confusing, especially when it comes to pointers and memory layout. This blog post aims to give beginners in C a kick-off and disenchant these concepts. In my humble opinion, if you master the pointers, you master the core concept of C language. Before Starting: This post is inspiried by this question on stackoverflow. For an easy kick-off, better if you already have these pre-knowledges (but no worries if you don’t, I’ll share some links): basic understanding of memory address & pointers in C: https://www.
